text: Anatoliy Ivanovych Butenko (23 February 1938 - 4 January 2021) was a Ukrainian politician. He was born in Myrhorod, Ukraine. He was a member of the Communist Party of Ukraine. From 1990 to 1994, he was a member of the Verkhovna Rada. Butenko died on 4 January 2021, aged 82.В Одессе умер один из первых народных депутатов Украины ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Members of the Verkhovna Rada
title: Anatoliy Butenko
